thread.title: Judith McGee Chair/CEO of McGee Wealth Management Named to Barron’s National List of Top 100 Women Financial Advisors 2015
thread.title_full: Judith McGee Chair/CEO of McGee Wealth Management Named to Barron’s National List of Top 100 Women Financial Advisors 2015

author: PRWEB
title: Judith McGee Chair/CEO of McGee Wealth Management Named to Barron’s National List of Top 100 Women Financial Advisors 2015
text:
The greatest honor will always be knowing that I am able to help our clients achieve and maintain financial independence (PRWEB) July 20, 2015
Judith McGee, L.H.D., C.F.P.® and Chair/CEO of McGee Wealth Management has been selected as one of Barron’s 2015 “Top 100 Women Financial Advisors” in the country. This prestigious listing is published by Barron’s Financial Newspaper. The Barron’s national ranking reflects revenues generated for the firms, the quality of the advisors’ practices, and the volume of assets overseen by the advisors and their teams.
“Though many women in the financial services industry have achieved much through hard work and perseverance, they represent only around 14% of all advisors. To be included in the Barron’s Top 100 Women Financial Advisors is an honor that my team and I accept with pride and humility. For me, the greatest honor will always be knowing that I’m able to help our clients achieve and maintain financial independence.” -- Judith McGee
Barron’s financial newspaper, published by Dow Jones & Co., produces the listing of distinguished advisors by weighing various criteria such as assets under management, revenue generated, and the overall quality of the CERTIFIED FINANCIAL PLANNER™ professional’s practice.
Judith McGee is frequently recognized as one of the nation’s top wealth managers by leading industry publications. Among them is Barron’s magazine, which has named McGee to its list of Top 1,000 Wealth Advisors in the U.S. every year since 2009. They have also placed her as one of Oregon’s top ten, and in 2015 she was ranked number one in Oregon. McGee attributes this prestigious achievement to her clients for their mutual trust and continued support, reinforcing her belief that putting her clients first is the best way to do business.
McGee Wealth Management is a fee based advisory wealth management firm integrating financial services with holistic planning, consulting, and asset management. With the exemplary credentialed staff, comprehensive services, and philanthropic recognition, McGee Wealth Management believes their motto, “Making Life a Richer Experience” exemplifies their stellar client relationships, which are built on trust and collaboration with a strong focus on the financial needs of multi-generational families.
McGee Wealth Management’s key team members include Judith McGee, L.H.D., C.F.P.®, ChFC, CEO/Chairwoman (MWM), Co-Branch manager (RJFS); D. Linette Dobbins, CFP®, President/CCO (MWM), Co-Branch Manager (RJFS); and Jennifer Currin Gutridge, CFP®, Executive Vice President (MWM) and Financial Advisor (RJFS). Securities offered throught Raymond James Financial Services, Inc. Member FINRA/SIPC. McGee Wealth Management is independent of Raymond James Financial Services. 12455 SW 68th Ave. Portland, OR 97223. 503-597-2222. Visit http://www.McGeeWM.com for more information. For media inquiries contact Diane at Inspired Media info(at)inspiredmc(dot)com.
